kvinna.title: Group exhibition - Mars 2026
kvinna.desc: Together with the gallerist Erika Wilhelmsson and a bunch of other atrists we arrange a fabolous celebration to womanhood.

clarion.title: Solo exhibition - June-September 2024
clarion.desc: The subject of the exhibition might spark connotations to shallowness, beauty and surface. Looking closer, you might discover a shift, a desire or what do YOU see? The exhibition will greet hotel visitors throughout the summer. Do go there and explore my art, enjoy the amazing restaurant NÃ“R and the wonderful Elemnts spa.

juste.title: Solo exhibition - May 2025
juste.desc: Welcome to an exhibition where you can explore some of my more experimental, abstract and playful work. We meet to celebrate joy, freedom and playfullness. Come as you are, mingle and have fun!

about.title: About the artist
about.intro1: The inner driving force emerges from feelings and impressions with emphasis on pain and injustice, freedom and hope. Kajsa has an attraction to the primordial power of humanity, nature and the great feminine strength, the one that is not always visible but is undoubtly there. The crucial aspects our society so often rushes past and thus misses out on.
about.quote: 'Her works are often initially created freely and intuitively, a bit like a dance'
about.intro2: After that, thoughts and a more structured workprocess takes place to produce a unique composition. Finally, an often lengthy process begins with completing the work and giving it its expression and feeling. It may take time, a silent protest against the machinery of society and its all too fast pace.
about.insta: ðŸ“¸ Follow for process, thoughts, inspiration etc

fact.origin: Born and raised on Gotland 1982, now living and working in Stockholm.
fact.drive: Influenced by her mother Lisa, who followed her passion and her dreams, despite the narrow social norms of the time.
fact.education: Autodidact until 2023 when she, as a 41 year old, attended a one year art program at Ã…gesta folkhÃ¶gskola. Batchelor degree in Graphic Arts.
fact.current: Works alongside art, or vice versa, with web development and graphic design.
